title: Citigroup Declares Common Stock Dividend; Citigroup Declares Preferred Dividends
summary: New York – The Board of Directors of Citigroup Inc. today declared a quarterly dividend on Citigroup's common stock of $0.51 per share, payable on November 24, 2021 to stockholders of record on November 1, 2021.
tag-1: Citigroup Declares Common Stock Dividend; Citigroup Declares Preferred Dividends
tag-2: New York – The Board of Directors of Citigroup Inc. today declared a quarterly dividend on Citigroup's common stock of $0.51 per share, payable on November 24, 2021 to stockholders of record on November 1, 2021.
